# Introduction

Tvix  (\[tvÉªks\], [ðŸ”ˆ][pronunciation]) is a new Rust implementation of the [Nix
package manager][Nix]. As a modular, composable implementation, Tvix is
well-suited for using or even replacing the parts of Nix you are interested
in.

Tvix still is in its early stages of development, **you cannot yet use it as a
Nix replacement**. However, if you willing to roll up your sleeves to pipe
together our existing features, thereâ€™s a chance Tvix may already be the answer
to your Nix-related problems.

Tvix is developed as a GPLv3-licensed free software project by [TVL][], with
source code available in the [TVL monorepo][].


[Nix]: https://nixos.org
[TVL]: https://tvl.fyi
[TVL monorepo]: https://cs.tvl.fyi/depot/-/tree/tvix
[pronunciation]: data:audio/mpeg;base64,
